word_mean: 诱发细胞癌变的物理、化学和生物因子。

sentence.Network_en: Chemical carcinogens generally require metabolic conversion to some form of " ultimate " carcinogen.
sentence.Network_cn: 化学致癌物一般需要通过代谢来转换成某种形式的 “ 最终 ” 致癌物.

sentence.Network_en: Medical studies indicated in recent years that furazolidone is a strong carcinogen.
sentence.Network_cn: 近年来医学研究表明,呋喃唑酮具有很强的致癌性.

sentence.Network_en: Colgate - Palmolive's toothpaste was said to contain a carcinogen.
sentence.Network_cn: 高露洁的牙膏也被说含有致癌物质.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from an abbreviation of carcinoma + -gen

entry.def: A carcinogen is a substance which can cause cancer.

auth_sentence.content: Branstetter says the carcinogen in question is called NNK.

auth_sentence.content: If absorbed in moderate doses only, it can be a carcinogen.

sentences.en: Some researchers contend that carcinogens may turn healthy cells into cancer cells.
sentences.cn: 有些研究人员认为,致癌物质能使健康细胞变成癌细胞。
